author: USA TODAY, Grace Hauck and Adrianna Rodriguez, USA TODAY
title: Your coronavirus questions, answered: Is my cat contagious? Should I disinfect groceries? Does UV light kill COVID-19?
description: Antibody tests, UV radiation, ventilator survival rates and more: USA TODAY is answering your specific questions about the coronavirus.
content:
An epidemiologist answers the biggest questions she's getting about coronavirus.
Wochit
As confirmed cases of the coronavirus continue to rise across the globe, the virus has affected all aspects of life, from the economy to schools to jobs to how you do yo… [+11647 chars]
